title: Gates Of Ishtar - Lossless
description:
Hi Guys,

this is my second public torrent. I had to create a Lossless-Torrent, 'cause you can't find anywhere on the net a HQ Release. Enjoy & remember this great band! And don't forget to buy their records. Stay heavy!

Remember Gates Of Ishtar!



INFOS:
Demotape is from somewhere out in the WWW (that's why it has only 128 kBit/s)

All Albums got ripped by myself in ALAC. So they are lossless. Feel free to convert it in any other shitty format. But true Metal-Fans listen to HQ-Music. They are all normalized. I hope u enjoy my release. Remember-  Enjoy Metal only in HQ.

Greetings.
